main event: On January 21, 1953, G.I. Allen reported sighting three oval-shaped, white objects approximately six feet in diameter in Eau Gallie, Florida.
interesting points: The objects were observed at an estimated altitude of thirty feet,The sighting lasted for approximately two seconds,The report stated there was no sound associated with the objects,These objects were visually sighted while the observer was standing six miles north of Eau Galle,The conclusion of the report indicated insufficient data for evaluation.
